summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Senegalese Twist Crochet Hair Extensions - Natural Black 32 Inch 8 Packs Pre-twisted Synthetic Crochet Braids Pre Looped Crotchet Hair Synthetic Braiding Hair(32 Inch,1B) Review Date: 2021/04/12 Store: ToyoTree Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'ToyoTree', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '32 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Thick,Thin', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '16 x 7.8 x 1.6 inches; 1.6 Pounds', 'UPC': '781827814338'} Review Text: Love the hair True to length to the point its too long for me. I'm 5"10 and these come to my butt which I wanted but its hard to deal with when I go to sit down and I sit on the braids and yank my head back. I will say is the only negative for me. Review Title: Super Cute Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Graffiti Nail Art Foils Sticker 10 Sheets, Foil Transfer Cartoon Funny Nail Art Sticker Young Trendy Holographic Nail Decals Design for Women Girls Nail Decoration Nail Art Supplies Review Date: 2021/04/22 Store: Mairs Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mairs', 'Surface Recommendation': 'Nail', 'Room Type': 'Living room bathroom bedroom', 'Theme': 'Cartoon', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Reusability': 'Single Use', 'Pattern': 'Cartoon', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '6.34 x 2.01 x 0.47 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Mairs-6', 'UPC': '750362844940'} Review Text: The way they show it makes it look like you actually get rolls of foils but it's not true u get 1 little 5 inch sheet per design. So don't mess up or you will be out of luck. Review Title: Disappointed Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 6Pieces/Lot 26" Pre-Stretched Braiding Crochet Hair Professional Long Human Hair Extension For Crochet Braids/Twist Perm Yaki Straight Easy Braid Hair For Women Hot Water Dip In(26inch,6pcs, 4) Review Date: 2021/06/11 Store: BigTrse Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'BigTrse', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '26 Inches', 'Hair Type': '长发, Straight'} Review Text: Yeah you gotta get this hair. Better quality than I expected. They have yet to let me down. Review Title: 2ND TIME ME ORDERING THIS HAIR AND WILL BUY IT AGAIN. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: BeautyGirl 8A Brazilian Straight Hair Bundles 20 20 22 22inches Unprocessed Straight Human Hair Bundles Weave Brazilian Straight Virgin Hair Extensions Natural Color Review Date: 2021/07/26 Store: BeautyGirl Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'BeautyGirl', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '22 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '11.18 x 7.72 x 2.09 inches; 10.23 Ounces', 'UPC': '784124211534'} Review Text: Update..... So after i open up the bundles I notice how poorly constructed the wefts are. They looked like someone sewed individual wefts together in a poor attempt to make a real bundle. There were lose threads all over the place and because the wefts weren't made correctly all this hair does is shed. Horrible just horrible. Oooh and the kicker took a hot comb to it. Don't do that shit shriveled up on contact so that being said its not real hair either....

The hair arrived on time, and the bundles are true to length, however that's the only highlight I can give. The bundles are so thin. If you are someone that normally doubles your wefts that's not gonna happen with these bundles. The hair has all kinds of un even split ends, the ends of the hair is so thin and frail that your going to have to cut a few inches off just to make it look decent. I'm glad I prepared for this and already had extra hair on stand by just in case this happened. I wouldn't recommend this hair unless your looking for a quick fix, but if that's the case there is other hair on here cheaper and better for that. Review Title: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAID FOR-NOT REAL HAIR Rating: 1.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase history reveals a consumer who demonstrates a strong preference for high-quality hair extensions, particularly favoring human hair over synthetic materials. They consistently rate satisfactory products highly, especially when the quality exceeds expectations, as evidenced by their enthusiastic reviews for certain hair extensions. 

Conversely, they express dissatisfaction with products that fall short in quality or misrepresentation, leading to lower ratings and negative sentiments. This pattern also highlights a tendency to value true length and realistic descriptions, indicating a desire for authenticity in purchases.

In terms of design and aesthetics, the consumer appreciates vibrant and trendy items, as shown by their interest in nail art foils, but their disappointment with the perceived value suggests a sensitivity to price versus quality. They may prioritize quality over quantity, as indicated by their willingness to repurchase successful items while avoiding products that appear poorly constructed or described.

Overall, this consumer likely prioritizes durability, authenticity, and quality of materials, with a clear sensitivity to value for money, consistently rewarding products that meet or exceed these standards.

target_interaction.title: Fits but Quality Ehhh
target_interaction.text: So I got these and was all happy that they fit and that the quality seemed good, but as soon as I started using the cap I started seeing where the seems from the material and the elastic band were already starting to fall apart, hopefully this isn't the case for all the caps but it did happen to 1 so far.
target_interaction.title_meta: 4 Packs Wig Caps for Wig Making - Dome Caps for Wigs,Mesh Dome Caps for Wigs,Mesh Dome Cap,Silk Wig Cap,Wig Caps for Women for Making Wigs(4 Pcs, Black, M)
